```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r load-libraries}

library(tidyverse)
library(unmarked)
library(MuMIn)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)

```


## Model 1: Intercept-Only

```{r intercept-only}

umf1 <- umf_independentCams_adults

m1 <- occu(~ 1 ~ 1,
           data = umf1,
           linkPsi = "logit")

```


## Model 2: Detection Trend Only (date terms: linear + quadratic)

```{r det-trend-only}

m2 <- occu(~ scOrdinal + scOrdinal2 ~ 1,
           data = umf1,
           linkPsi = "logit")
```
